column5: I'me getting lots of PM's about signing up. Honestly I get so many that odds are I will miss many requests, so I won't add people through the PM. We also want to be sure you read the rules so you don't drive your captain nuts. Sign up by posting to the official sign up thread...  Click here

Rick, I do not have a digital camera. Would it still be possible to sign up?  Secondly, I think it would be nice if they had two groups for walleye.  The first would be for inland lakes and the second one for BIG LAKES.  I can't compete against the BOQ guys like Cliff (LOL) No chance there!

Nelly...Pics are a must, but you can use a film camera then scan the images or negatives and upload the resultant picture. If the captains want a great lakes/non great lakes separation of walleye, it is something they can vote on. But I think you will find the difference in walleye from the Great Lakes to be primarily in girth, not so much in length due to the food available.
Thanks for your reply Rick. Signing up now.
